title: Found’s Karan Oberoi Teases Dhan’s Background, Exciting Final Stretch & Authentic Gabi Bond

title: Yellowjackets is a Bait-and-Switch for First-Time Viewers
description: Yellowjackets is a cash cow for Showtime, but the star-studded series might have first-time viewers wondering what they signed up for. The post Yellowjackets is a Bait-and-Switch for First-Time Viewers appeared first on TV Fanatic.

title: Masked Singer Shocker: Lucky Duck Revealed! Did You Guess Correctly?
description: Well, that was unexpected. The Masked Singer on Wednesday wrapped the Season 13 semifinals with a jaw-dropping — actually, make that beak-dropping — reveal. That’s right, feathered friends and frenemies, we finally know the identity of the show’s duckbilled detective. After the viewers sent Pearl and Mad Scientist Monster through to next week’s finale, Coral […]
author: Andy Swift

title: Casting News: Anthony Michael Hall Joins Wednesday, Y&R Exit and More
description: Anthony Michael Hall is reteaming with his Edward Scissorhands director Tim Burton on Wednesday. The actor will appear in an undisclosed role during Season 2 of the Netflix series, which Burton executive-produces and directs, our sister site Variety reports. Hall’s TV credits include Reacher, The Goldbergs, Bosch: Legacy, Awkward and The Dead Zone. As previously […]
author: Vlada Gelman
